snippet.title: Deadlight: Director's Cut Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Face your fears, or face death. There is no escape.

Deadlight rises once more, spreading its deadliest infection yet to PlayStation®4, Xbox One and PC. With improved graphics and a host of new content, Deadlight: Directors cut will deliver the definitive Deadlight experience when it launches on 21st June 2016.

Visit  www.deadlightgame.com for more information.
